verified.title: ğŸ”’ Email Verification Required
verified.description:
This command requires email verification via Discord OAuth.

**When you verify, you will:**
â€¢ Agree to the bot's terms of service
â€¢ Grant access to your email
â€¢ Activate your account for premium features

**Click the button below to start:**

language.description: Set the bot language for this server
language.success_description:
The bot language for this server has been set to **{language}**

**Note:** Slash commands will still display in your Discord language, but responses will use the set language.

prefix.description: Set a custom command prefix for this server
prefix.success_description:
**Old Prefix:** `{old}`
**New Prefix:** `{new}`

You can now use prefix commands with `{new}`
Example: `{new}help`, `{new}ping`
